static byte[] ReadBytes (IntPtr handle, long address, uint bytesToRead)
 Read a specified number of bytes from a process.
static byte ReadByte (IntPtr handle, long address)
 Read a byte from memory.
static short ReadShort (IntPtr handle, long address)
 Read a short from memory.
static int ReadInt (IntPtr handle, long address)
 Read an integer from the process (actually a short because it is only 4 bytes).
static double ReadDouble (IntPtr handle, long address)
 Read a 32-bit double from the process.
static string ReadString (IntPtr handle, long address)
 Read a string from memmory. Splits at 00 and returns first section to avoid junk. Uses default length of 255. Use ReadString(IntPtr handle, long address, int length) to read longer strings, such as the RSA key.
static string ReadString (IntPtr handle, long address, uint length)
 Read a string from memmory. Splits at 00 and returns first section to avoid junk.
static bool WriteBytes (IntPtr handle, long address, byte[] bytes, uint length)
 Write a specified number of bytes to a process.
static bool WriteInt (IntPtr handle, long address, int value)
 Write an integer to memory.
static bool WriteDouble (IntPtr handle, long address, double value)
 Write a double value to memory.
static bool WriteByte (IntPtr handle, long address, byte value)
 Write a byte to memory.
static bool WriteString (IntPtr handle, long address, string str)
 Write a string to memory.
static bool WriteRSA (IntPtr handle, long address, string newKey)
 Set the RSA key. Different from WriteString because must overcome protection.

static string Tibia.Memory.ReadString ( IntPtr  handle,
long  address 
) [static]

Read a string from memmory. Splits at 00 and returns first section to avoid junk. Uses default length of 255. Use ReadString(IntPtr handle, long address, int length) to read longer strings, such as the RSA key.

Parameters:
handle 
address 
Returns:
